entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

RAIN LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
